attributes.action: Change the current Licencing Laws by fining landlords whose pubs and clubs are often the scene of drunken behaviour, and if need be allowing Councils to take away their licences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Longer Licencing hours do not seem to have curtailed the "binge drinking" culture. The customers who over indulge in alcoholic consumption should be fined heavily, and the landlords who knowingly sell alcohol to customers who are over the limit should also be fined, as they are at fault. If three concurrent fines are levied, then the establishment should be closed for a certain time or the licence should be cancelled.
The price of any police involvement should also be levied.
Current Licencing laws do not work, and the opening times should be drastically reduced.
